description.value:
While those who appreciate bagpipes may like the sound of this gray reed and black leather instrument, its real purpose is to sow turmoil against a performer's enemies, spreading discord with each note. While playing the bagpipes, you gain a +2 item bonus to Performance checks and to Intimidation checks made to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Demoralize].

Activate Cast a Spell

Effect You expend a number of charges from this instrument to cast a spell from its list.

  • Cantrip @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Daze]
  • 1st @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Bane]
  • 2nd @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Deafness], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Knock], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Shatter]
  • 3rd @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Agonizing Despair], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Paralyze]
  • 4th @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Confusion], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Painful Vibrations]
  • 5th @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Banishment], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Wave of Despair], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Synaptic Pulse]

Craft Requirements Supply one casting of all listed ranks of all listed spells.
